title: They Are Billions [v.0.4.9] (2017) PC | RePack by R.G. Freedom
description:
Year: 12.12.2017
Genre: Strategy, Early Access
Developer: Numantian Games
Publisher: Numantian Games
Interface language: English
Language of voice: English
Type of publication: RePack
Game version: 0.4.9
Crack: Enclosing (3DM)


System requirements:

✓ OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 and 64 bits)
✓ Processor: INTEL, AMD 2 cores CPU at 2Ghz
✓ RAM: 4 Gb
✓ Video: Intel HD3000, Radeon, Nvidia card with shader model 3, 1GB video ram.
✓ DirectX: 9.0c
✓ HDD: 4 GB
✓ Additionally: Minimum resolution: 1360x768, recomended FULL HD 1920x1080.



Description:

They Are Billions is a strategy game in a distant future about building and managing human colonies after a zombie apocalypse destroyed almost all of human kind. Now there are only a few thousand humans left alive that must struggle to survive under the threat of the infection. Billions of infected roam around the world in massive swarms seeking the last living human colonies.



Features repack:

1. Based on the release of 3DM;
2. Nothing is cut;
3. Nothing is recoded;
4. Installation time ~ 1-2 minutes;
5. Tested on Win7 x64 (Ultimate);
6. RePack by R.G. Freedom





Attention! The installation repack present Adguard installer. If you do not want to install on your computer Adguard, then please remove the check mark from the "Yes, I want to install Adguard for my PC."
